short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove sponsored items from search results on Amazon and Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unsponsored Search provides you with an ad-free search experience on popular platforms like Google and Amazon. 

Tired of sponsored ads cluttering your search results? 

With Unsponsored Search, you can focus solely on genuine search results, without the distraction of sponsored content. Enjoy a cleaner and more streamlined search experience, free from ads that may skew your search queries. Install Unsponsored Search today and regain control of your search experience!
